title: What is unique about OnePlus Nord? - Quora

response.answer_text: Oneplus nord has launched nord N10 of 8gb ram +128 GB storage @ Rs. 27999 and 12GB RAM +256 GB storage @ Rs. 29999 In term of camera nord has total six lenses wher as oneplus 8 has only four. It include 48Mp Sony IMX586 primary sensor, 8MP ultra wide lens, 5MP depth sensor and a 2MP macro lens. It’s primary shooter is of 32MP and secondary 8MP ultra wide image sensor for great selfies and video calls. Futuristic affordability with 5G ready with download speed upto 3.38 gbps nord puts broad band to shame. Nord has 6.44 inch Amoled display that offers a 90Hz refresh rate. It is powered by latest Qualcomm snapdragon 755G and it runs on 4115mAh battery with warp charge 30T fast charging technology. OnePlus Nord N10 5G and N100. What to expect? – Khaali Pocket
USP of one plus nord is mid premium experience at budget pricing.
